description.raw:
Looks up from server listed on `config.yaml` by default:

![ignfuel.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/ekkEdGa/images/79013820-ignfuel.png)

...

![ignfuel1.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/ekkEdGa/images/692010487-ignfuel1.png)

Accepts custom server:

![ignfuel2.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/ekkEdGa/images/4006427100-ignfuel2.png)

***

I haven't enabled tests in pipelines yet because:

1. I haven't been able to get the command working together with an `ignition-tools` deb install
    Possible solutions:
    * Install from source on pipelines (need to fix issue #43 first)
    * Set `IGN_CONFIG_PATH` so tools can find the fuel command, see [this ign-tools issue](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-tools/issues/2/create-debian-package#comment-43751605)
1. Or been able to get the test to work without installing ign-fuel-tools
    Possible solutions:
    * Install before test for now
    * Figure it out
